name: Watch+Jam 2 MUD
description:
Technically, it's a complete MUD. Technically.

Play online here: https://watchjam.placeholder.co.za/webclient/

Watch+Jam 2 MUD was created was a submission to the Watch+Jam 2 game jam. It is written in Python using the Evennia engine.

The game source and development is tracked in Bitbucket
